eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Bronx; Kings; New York; Queens; Richmond, NY; at 08:08 AM ON JAN 8, 2026 Effective until 10:08 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. In the event of an actual emergency, this system would bring you important information. This is only a test.
